title: Lunch at this Kindness Cafe pop-up where proceeds go to a CNY party for migrant workers

organizations.name: sgt like coconuts sg on facebook us follow coconuts sg

text:
Lunch at this Kindness Cafe pop-up where proceeds go to a CNY party for migrant workers By Coconuts Singapore January 3, 2017 / 12:58 SGT Like Coconuts SG on Facebook us Follow Coconuts SG on Twitter us Follow 
Screengrab from video 0 
Kick off 2017 with your New Year resolutions intact and your karma in good order at the Kindness Cafe pop-ups this week. Serving up karaage burgers ($15) and cups of coffee ($4), Kindness On-The-Go food trucks will be visiting business districts to feed the hungry lunch crowds (and give you a chance to do a good deed). 
For every purchase, you'll be paying it forward and contributing towards meals for migrant workers over Lunar New Year. And since the food trucks are organised by the Singapore Kindness Movement , if you say 'please' and 'thank you' while you're served, you'll get $1 off your order. 
Kindness On-The-Go Food Trucks will be at Ocean Financial Centre on Jan 4 & 6, and Entrance of Matrix Building (in front of Starbucks) on Jan 5, 11am-2pm.
